page.title: PX4ProductionNaming
page.descr: Names and descriptions of production methods used to produce wares

page.title: PX4SpecialNaming
page.t:
As a result of the ever present Xenon, a set of modified blueprints were sent to the Argon, Paranid, and Teladi by a freelancer named ManDaxi.

These included a full set of engines, thrusters, shields, and even a few weapons.

The modified blueprints were then put into immediate production, and are available for purchase from faction representitives.
